info.description: Content Management System API for managing series, episodes, and categories
info.title: CMS API

get.description: Get a paginated list of all categories available in the system

post.description: Create a new category with the provided data

get.description: Get a single category by its ID

put.description: Update an existing category with the provided data

delete.description: Soft delete a category by its ID

post.description: Import content from YouTube, and other sources

get.description: Get a paginated list of all series available in the system

post.description: Create a new series with the provided data

get.description: Get a paginated list of all episodes for a specific series
get.summary: List episodes by series with pagination

post.description: Create a new episode for a series

get.description: Get a single episode by its ID

put.description: Update an existing episode with the provided data

delete.description: Soft delete an episode by its ID

post.description: Confirm that the file was successfully uploaded and update episode metadata
Validates the episode ID and returns a temporary URL for the client to upload a file directly to S3.
post.summary: Get a pre-signed URL for an episode media upload

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., invalid ID, missing filename)

get.description: Get a single series by its ID

put.description: Update an existing series with the provided data

delete.description: Soft delete a series by its ID

BearerAuth.description: JWT Bearer token for authentication. Example: "Bearer <token>"
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
